residential.title: Residential Cleaning
content: Keeping a home truly clean can be overwhelming â€” especially with a busy lifestyle, kids, pets, or unexpected guests. Dust builds up in corners, bathrooms lose their shine, and kitchens can quickly feel greasy or cluttered. Our residential cleaning service is designed to take that stress off your shoulders and bring lasting freshness and clarity to your living space.

We go far beyond surface cleaning. Our trained team handles every room in your home â€” vacuuming carpets, mopping hardwood floors, wiping baseboards, disinfecting door handles, polishing faucets, and eliminating dust from furniture and blinds. Kitchens are degreased and sanitized, bathrooms are scrubbed from tiles to fixtures, and living spaces are refreshed with care. We use eco-conscious, child-safe products that clean effectively without leaving harsh chemical traces.

Whether you need regular upkeep or a one-time refresh, our service adapts to your schedule and needs. From cozy apartments to large family homes, we customize our work to deliver results that support a cleaner, healthier lifestyle. Youâ€™ll notice the difference not only in how your space looks â€” but in how it feels to live in it.

office.title: Office Cleaning
content: Maintaining a clean office isn't just about appearance â€” it directly impacts employee health, focus, and the impression your business leaves on clients. A well-maintained workspace promotes productivity, reduces the spread of germs, and shows that you value professionalism. Our office cleaning service is designed for companies that care about their image and their team.

We cover every area of your office: desks, meeting rooms, lobbies, break rooms, bathrooms, and high-touch surfaces like doorknobs, switches, and shared equipment. Trash is removed, floors are vacuumed and mopped, and glass surfaces are polished to a streak-free shine. We can schedule cleanings after hours or on weekends to avoid disrupting your workflow.

From small startups to multi-floor corporate offices, our team is trained to work efficiently, discreetly, and with minimal disruption. Whether you need daily, weekly, or one-time cleanings, weâ€™ll create a plan tailored to your workspace. Let us help you create a clean, professional environment that reflects your brand.

deepclean.title: Deep Cleaning
content: Deep cleaning is perfect when your space needs more than routine upkeep. Over time, dirt builds up in places that regular cleaning misses â€” behind appliances, inside cabinets, on grout lines, and under furniture. Our deep cleaning service restores those forgotten spaces and brings your environment back to life.

We tackle built-up grease, soap scum, dust bunnies, limescale, and allergens with industrial-grade tools and non-toxic products. Kitchens, bathrooms, baseboards, doors, light switches â€” nothing is overlooked. We go under, behind, and around to ensure a truly refreshed space.

This service is ideal for seasonal resets, post-sickness sanitation, before guests arrive, or after long periods of neglect. It pairs well with regular cleaning plans and delivers a noticeable upgrade in air quality and overall comfort.

airbnb.title: Turnaround Cleaning Services
content: Maximize your bookings and guest satisfaction with SolVida Clean's specialized Airbnb and short-term rental cleaning services. We understand the critical importance of a fast, efficient, and impeccably clean turnover between guests, especially here in Boston. Our professional team ensures your property is always guest-ready, providing a consistently sparkling experience that earns you 5-star reviews and repeat bookings, allowing you to focus on managing your listings, not the grime.

Our detailed service covers everything: sanitizing kitchens/bathrooms, fresh linen changes, and thorough dusting/flooring care. We deliver hotel-quality cleanliness, working reliably with your schedule to meet tight check-in deadlines. Our vetted team meticulously prepares your space for every new arrival.

Choose SolVida Clean to effortlessly manage your Airbnb's cleanliness and enhance guest satisfaction in Boston. We offer flexible, eco-friendly services, dedicated to helping you achieve outstanding reviews. Focus on your rentals; we'll handle the immaculate turnovers.

postconst.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
content: Renovation is exciting â€” but drywall dust, sawdust, glue residue, and debris can ruin the experience fast. Our post-construction cleaning service is built to remove every trace of the job so you can enjoy your new space safely and comfortably.

We sweep, vacuum, and mop all floors; remove dust from vents, light fixtures, ledges, and surfaces; clean interior windows and mirrors; and polish bathrooms and kitchens. Stickers, caulk residue, and fine dust? Gone.
This service is essential for general contractors, homeowners, and landlords preparing for move-in, inspections, or handovers. Your freshly finished property will be spotless and presentation-ready.

moveout.title: Move-In / Move-Out Cleaning
content: Moving is stressful â€” and cleaning either your old or new place is usually the last thing you want to deal with. Our move-in/move-out service takes care of that for you so you can focus on your transition.

We scrub every surface: inside cabinets and drawers, under sinks, inside ovens and refrigerators, and all floors, walls, and baseboards. Bathrooms are sanitized, kitchens are deep cleaned, and all rooms are left fresh and spotless.
Whether you're a tenant trying to secure your deposit or a property manager preparing for a new occupant, this service ensures the space is move-in ready â€” or move-out approved.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.headline: How can we help you?
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our cleaning services. Can't find what you're looking for?

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Our friendly team is here to help you with any specific questions about our services, pricing, or scheduling. We're just a message away!

howItWorks.question: How does SolVida work?
howItWorks.answer: SolVida makes scheduling a home cleaning simple and hassle-free. Just choose your service, get an instant quote, and book your appointment online. We take care of the rest, using eco-friendly products and trusted professionals.

worthIt.question: Is hiring a cleaning service worth it?
worthIt.answer: Absolutely. A cleaning service saves you time and stress, ensuring your home stays fresh, healthy, and sparkling. With SolVida, you're also supporting green practices that are safer for pets and families.

getQuote.question: How do we get a quote?
getQuote.answer: Visit our website and fill out our quick quote form. Just enter your home details and preferences â€” we'll give you an instant, transparent price with no surprises.

whatsIncluded.question: What's included in a flat-rate cleaning?
whatsIncluded.answer: Our flat-rate cleanings cover all essential areas: kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, living areas, and surfaces. We also include dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and trash removal â€” always using non-toxic, family-safe products.

supplies.question: Do you bring supplies?
supplies.answer: We do! Our team brings all necessary supplies and equipment, including eco-friendly and hypoallergenic products. No need to worry about a thing.

greenCleaning.question: Do you offer Green Cleaning?
greenCleaning.answer: Yes â€” it's our standard! All of our cleanings are green by default. We use biodegradable, non-toxic products that are safe for the environment, your family, and your pets.

payment.question: What payment methods do you take?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards. For safety and simplicity, payment is processed securely online â€” no need to handle cash or checks.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: Prices vary depending on the size and condition of your home. Use our quote tool for an accurate, no-obligation estimate in under 60 seconds.

problem.question: What if there's a problem?
problem.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If anything isn't right, let us know within 24 hours and we'll make it right â€” whether it's a re-clean or other solution.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We stand by our quality. If our cleaning didn't meet your expectations, we'll evaluate the situation and offer a re-clean or a refund â€” no questions asked.

cancellation.question: Is there a cancellation fee?
cancellation.answer: We offer flexible scheduling. Just cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours before your appointment â€” no fee at all. Same-day cancellations may incur a small fee.

beHome.question: Do I have to be home?
beHome.answer: Not at all. Many of our clients prefer to provide instructions and entry access beforehand. Your security and privacy are always respected.

howManyCleaners.question: How many cleaners come?
howManyCleaners.answer: We usually send one or two professionals depending on your home's size and service type. All of them are trained, background-checked, and highly rated.

whenCharged.question: When is my card charged?
whenCharged.answer: We charge your card only after the service is completed â€” never before. You'll receive an email confirmation and receipt immediately after.

tipping.question: Should I tip?
tipping.answer: Tipping is never required, but always appreciated for excellent service. You can tip in cash or request to add it to your invoice.

whatNotClean.question: What don't you clean?
whatNotClean.answer: For safety reasons, we avoid biohazard cleanup, hoarding situations, mold remediation, and heavy-duty outdoor work. If you're unsure, just ask.

sameCleaner.question: Can I request the same cleaner?
sameCleaner.answer: Yes, we try to accommodate recurring requests whenever possible. Consistency helps us serve you better â€” just let us know your preference.

feedback.question: How can I leave feedback?
feedback.answer: We love hearing from you! After your cleaning, you'll get a follow-up email where you can rate your experience and share feedback directly.
